title: S17 Ep49: TCT: Ripped From The Headlines II
itunes:title: TCT: Ripped From The Headlines II
description:
True Crime Tuesday presents Ripped From The Headlines II with Beer City Bruiser!

With the world and it's media being focused on just a few topics, we dig up the true crime topics that everyone is either talking about online, or you might have missed altogether!

Tim and Bruiser jump into the Johnny Depp/Amber Heard civil case, Talk about Tyson's Airplane Punchout victim, and we discuss the social media activity of the killer in Forest Hills, NY and just how transparent it was to the crimes he committed!

Check out where Beer City Bruiser will be in your area:  https://twitter.com/bcbwinchester

Darkness Radio has partnered with the UFO Disclosure Symposium in late May! Be part of this newsworthy conference and get your tickets here: https://ufodisclosuresymposium.com/?ref=tim%40darknessradio.com
